#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define m 10000
long long int arr[100000] = {0};

void cat( )
{
     arr[0] = arr[1] = 1;

 for (int i=2; i<=1000; i++)
    {
         for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
            {arr[i] += ((arr[j]%m) * (arr[i-j-1]%m))%m;
             arr[i] = arr[i]%m;
            }

    }


}




int main()
{
int t;
cin>> t;
 cat();
 while(t--)
 {
 int n;
 cin>> n;
  cout<< arr[n-1] << endl;
 //else cout<< arr[n-1] << endl;

 }}
